Yesterday sucked. But that feeling only makes me more determined to keep pushing, keep improving and keep getting stronger.
Know that every one of your messages gives me that same motivation. Thank you for the incredible support, it means a lot 👊
I don’t know what to say. No excuses. I’m so sorry guys.

Now more than ever, we need peace and equality in this world. It’s time we all stand together and kick racism out of our societies for good. Use your voice, spread awareness as far as you can. We’re all responsible for ending the injustice. [3/3] #BlackLivesMatter

I struggle to comprehend what I’m seeing in the news and on social media right now - and honestly, I still can’t find the words to express how it makes me feel. But ultimately, no matter how uncomfortable it may be to speak out, silence achieves nothing. [2/3] #BlackLivesMatter

We all have a voice to speak up for what’s right – and until now I didn’t know how to use mine in this situation. To echo @Charles_Leclerc's words, I just felt out of place sharing my thoughts on these atrocities publicly. [1/3] #BlackLivesMatter

Our pace was actually pretty decent - somehow being the fastest car on track for a lap towards the end of the race! Awesome memories. Waiting another year to get back on those streets hurts - but it'll be oh so sweet when we do! [2/2]

Gutted not to be doing this again today. That Quali lap was one of my highlights of the season and it took 40-50 of those in a row on Sunday just to keep the tyres in the window with the lack of downforce we had, which was just so much fun! [1/2] https://t.co/NGTEK7i6tN
That was Niki. I’ll remember that evening forever. ❤️ [3/3]

Next thing I know I’m on the back of a golf buggy with Toto to meet Niki at the hotel before setting off to boogie to the Black Eyed Peas & Nicole Scherzinger all evening - something I would never have expected to be doing in my life, let alone my 1st weekend with the team. [2/3]

Baku 2017. My first race with @MercedesAMGF1 as the new boy and first time properly getting to know Niki. Saturday night after qualifying, we’re chatting away and he asks if I fancy going to the concert that evening, which took me by surprise to say the least. [1/3] https://t.co/Tq4pbTT0mh
